bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard Policy Language Requirements and System Architectures for Dynamic Spectrum Access Systems
IEEE Draft Standard Policy Language Requirements and System Architectures for Dynamic Spectrum Access Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines a vendor-independent set of policy-based control architectures and corresponding policy language requirements for managing the functionality and behavior of dynamic spectrum access networks.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: DSA; DySPAN; Policy Language; Policy Based DSA Radio Systems; DSA Architecture.
